name: A not very well written book
name_original: A not very well written book
description:
in a paralelle world, demons have been attacking a lot recently, but you've find a book that tell you exactly what to do to push them away.

you'll need to analyse the monster, then check the book to now what is the exact symbol to draw on a pentagram and push demons away.
this game was done for the Global Game Jam 2016, and also its my first time doing a Jam and a Game from A to Z, by myself.
hope you'll have fun playin' it!

you can follow my work on
facebook : https://www.facebook.com/artofseniorx/
